text: Wilson Brown (August 27, 1804 – August 27, 1855) was an American politician. He was the Lieutenant Governor of Missouri from 1853 until his death in office in 1855.http://ltgov.mo.gov/history-office-lieutenant-governor/ He also served in the Missouri House of Representatives from 1838 to 1839.http://www.semissourian.com/story/150102.html ==References== Category:1804 births Category:1855 deaths Category:Lieutenant Governors of Missouri Category:Members of the Missouri House of Representatives Category:Missouri Democrats Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Wilson Brown (politician)
